website_summaries.verdict: Choose this affordable hemp protein if you like the idea of the high fiber content and don't mind that it's somewhat thick and gritty.
pros: Excellent source of fiber, as it contains 14g per serving
Flavor is mild and somewhat nutty
cons: Texture is on the gritty side

customer_reviews.title: Great hemp protein at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value! Hemp from North America for $5.24? Sold! I enjoy the taste plain, but it's green, nutty flavor is best blended with other ingredients. I often add a tablespoon or two vegan protein shakes for added protein and fiber, as well as to cut sweetness. Some people might find the texture bothersome. Hemp protein doesnt mix very well with thin liquids; some separation starts occurring. This is less of a problem with thicker liquids like smoothies. It also is pretty gritty. If that bothers you a great deal, it may not be for you. Make sure you rinse glassware after drinking - dried on hemp mixture is really hard to get off!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Natural Medicine!
customer_reviews.text: I take hemp protein as natural medicine to lower my cholesterol, blood pressure and weight loss and not for the taste. I am less hungry during the day after having a shake in the morning. Hemp has green nutrients, fiber and omega 3 so I dont buy this nutrients seperately any more. Bloating was gone after the first few days of taking the product. I like animal protein and wont give it up but I give my body a break from it with hemp protein.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is not a product you’d want to drink alone with water. If you mix it with frozen fruit like a smoothie it’s perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for those with allergies
customer_reviews.text: This is unflavored hemp powder so taste is like old rope. It does not bother me because being unflavored did not expect anything else. It is earthy soil taste and goes well to coat sweet potato wedge slices before baking. I also add 4 tablespoons to my morning green smoothie and blends in well. It does add slight bitterness so add 2 strawberries to cut bitterness. It has helped me add protein into my diet without soy, which I am allergic to. If need fiber and protein supplements, but have allergies this is solid option.
customer_reviews.author: Leebernie

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing, but found it 3 dollars cheaper at walmart 👎
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. My husband and myself haven't found anything else natural that works like this stuff! The reason for the picture is because I just found this at walmart for 3 dollars less. It's a big deal to us because we go through a container a week.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my everyday smoothie and add it to my pancake mix. It’s definitely a great product and I have it on my monthly subscription list. Though it doesn’t blend as some other products I have used, it might just be the batch. I just received my second delivery and hopefully this one is a more finer powder!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Not my first choice but it’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Settles at the bottom of a drink more than other hemp powders, but works well for baking banana bread-like recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Tayoshum

customer_reviews.title: Totally gross stay away
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product tried it once and couldn't stomach it at all. I have an allergy to whey and milk products and have tried hemp as an alternative. When I tried this it literally scratched up my throat going down. I have tried other Hemp proteins but have never had that happen. I had a sore throat for the rest of the day. I tried to contact the seller via email about this but never received a response back. Bad product and bad customer service. STAY AWAY FROM THIS ONE.
customer_reviews.author: Sammytheblade

customer_reviews.title: What a delightfully awful taste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells kind of like mowed grass. It tastes kind of like I would imagine a combination of grass and dirt would taste like. About as palatable as fence picket.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddyHouston

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix
customer_reviews.text: First time I am taking hemp, so no strong preference or opinion but it doesn’t blend. Putting it in the blender for my smoothie leaves it sitting on the bottom. Trying to mix by hand seems to work out better
customer_reviews.author: vrv

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: OMG! None of the reviews mentions that this product is green and tastes like crap!!
customer_reviews.author: Oomie55

customer_reviews.title: Vegan, GF, Affordable, Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vegan protein powder that I’ve tried. Although I can only use half the serving at a time with it overwhelming the taste of my smoothies. It is on the gritty size at the full serving quantity. But at half the serving, there is minimal grittiness or noticeable taste. I am a lover of hemp seeds, I add them to many things. I detest the taste of pea protein so I will repurchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kengreen38

customer_reviews.title: Not for water alone
customer_reviews.text: Im on my second container of it and in smoothies is my favorite method of consumpion. I put the hemp powder into water to soak a little while i grab frozen fruit (blueberries strawberries mangos and blackberries) peanut butter and greek yogurt. This stuff doesnt dissolve and is grainy but with all the seeds in a smoothie its not that noticeable. I have not tried baking with this powder. Overall I will keep purchasing this product until I have a reason not to.
customer_reviews.author: A guy

customer_reviews.title: It's a good price for a respectable product considering that it's lower in protein than most
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully have no idea if it's working or not however it's a good source of protein supposedly and I've used hemp powder for a while now. I'm satisfied it is nice that is non-GMO and a good price. It's lower in protein than most
customer_reviews.author: John L. Fermoil Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I replaced Flax Seed Ground with this in my Smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I have green smoothie alternate mornings as breakfast and use 1 hearty spoon of flax seed ground from 365 organic. I tried to replace it with Hemp and it worked fine, no change in the flavor and nutrition wise a better improvement. Also my motivation to try this was because it was on sale and very good price. Maybe if the price is comparable to flax seed I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: blusterfind

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all better when you blend with fresh fruits.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: can't go wrong woth hemp protein. This mixes good but then the hemp protien settles to the bottom. Not a problem in a shaker cup though, you just have to keep shaking or else you end up with a gritty left over mixture. There's no scoop included but the suggested serving size is 4 tablespoons or 1/4 cup. Flavor isn't bad at all
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great taste, great price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite protein powder. It tastes great, & it mixing easily with everything I put it in. Protein shakes with hemp fibers plus and sea moss, fruit smoothies,vegan banana breads...yummmmm!!! I order 2 at a time ,I love this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele zar

customer_reviews.title: In love with Hemp
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for smoothies and I also enjoy all the benefits that Hemp brings to any smoothie including fiber.. do understand that if you never tried hemp products, they can taste very earthy so keep that in mind if this is your 1st time. You can also tweak your smoothies until you get a handle on the flavor. Other than that is a great Omegas 3 and 6, fiber and plant proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Real food deserves realistic expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty good product. It doesn’t stay mixed in my keto coffee like some protein does, but it works ok. I just have a bit of grit at the bottom. But I like the ingredients and the way I feel full and energetic after having it.
customer_reviews.author: Alana D.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to smoothies but awful flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have been adding this to my smoothies in the morning for about a week now. I definitely feel fuller and more satiated with this addition. However, I just can't get past the awful flavor. Tastes like stale cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Great value/ingredients , not great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I actually got a few of these to use in my protein shakes, but the taste isn’t too good. I suppose if you mix with another protein powder it will mask the taste. I like this because of the ingredients, it’s probably not best to use solely for protein but I am sensitive to the artificial ingredients in most protein powders. The fiber is great in keeping me regular. Good value for the money. Would’ve been 5 stars if the taste wasn’t so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoyah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Picky Eaters
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product to add a protein element for post-yoga/post-run smoothies. It tastes great but I'm not a huge protein shake person so I don't have much to compare it to. I'm a picky eater and hate weird textures. This blended pretty well into my smoothies, just had to blend for a bit longer. It really helped me stay strong throughout the day after a 75 min hot yoga class or a 3+ mile run. I used to get really tired part of the way through the day but, after using this consistently, my mid-day energy levels are up. Will definitely continue buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very chalky with a lot settled at the bottom but it's good for your health
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best tasting in the world (it's kinda grassy) but I take it in my shakes so i just chuck it. It's "fibery" and they settle pretty fast. Price is good (I got it when it was on sale for less than $3) and ingredients/quality is great so I have no complaint. It goes well in smoothies and shakes to add protein and fiber. I think people use it to bake too but I am not a baker.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren’s mommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent protein powder! I can’t believe how good the price is for this product. This is pure hemp protein powder so some may not like the taste. However, that means no sweeteners, artificial or otherwise. Not only is this a good source of protein with a great amino acid profile. It is a fantastic source of fiber. Oh... and did I mention the price!
customer_reviews.author: VCR

customer_reviews.title: Pure hemp powder but feels as if you are drinking sand
customer_reviews.text: It is a great source of protein and fiber but the texture is awful. Taste is not so great. Felt as if I am drinking sand. Would recommend blending with sorbet, ice cream, oatmeal and or frozen fruits to blend with it in a blender (bc stirring gives it the sandy like milk/water texture) so it isn't so bad... will not be buying again
customer_reviews.author: lucia lopez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't dissolve
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dissolve at all. Maybe it would be okay in baking but for shakes, it is terribly grainy since it won't dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Brandon Ponton Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The flavor isnt for everyone. I happen to like earthy flavored things. So, it is pretty good to me. I feel good when I drink this. It doesn't get you high. It doesn't make me sleepy like whey protein powder does. It's not loaded with a bunch of junk and sugar. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Young

customer_reviews.title: Very gritty texture.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm going to have to agree with all the reviews saying the powder is gritty. If you like the texture of seeds in your smoothie, then this is the powder for you. I bought it to add extra nutrients to my kid's smoothies but they wouldn't drink it because of the really grainy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Gritty but useful and natural
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried to make a shake with it yet, although I imagine it would be pretty rough. I have made pancakes with this stuff and they don’t taste too far off from the original flavor. Be aware that it’s a very gritty powder. The pancakes also turn a strange color but I didn’t mind
customer_reviews.author: NTG

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Works great in smoothies, doesn’t clump or taste gritty. I don’t even notice it except for the green color. Great easy way to add plant protein and fiber to smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: INgirl

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this protein powder after finding it on sale and it has been a great purchase. The powder mixes very well with a shaker bottle and has a like able taste! Too early to tell about the difference compared to my Optimum Nutrition protein, but I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Naureen

customer_reviews.title: It is GROSS!
customer_reviews.text: I wasted my money buying TWO of these on my first order. It has a horrible taste, unless you like the taste of dirt. And it separates in our Smoothies. Save your money and find some regular protein. We only opened one of them so I'm considering returning the other.
customer_reviews.author: Harpermd

customer_reviews.title: My First Choice
customer_reviews.text: Tried few hemp powder recently and this one is equally comparable. Its very similar to trader joes one, though TJ says vanilla flavored which is not true. This one has the best value for money
customer_reviews.author: Harshi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I needed some protein powder that wasn't gross. This one is great.
customer_reviews.author: Malika Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a fiber rich diet
customer_reviews.text: I got an amazing deal on these and I am glad I ordered three. It's an acquired taste but more important is what it does for you. Even a simple green smoothie is amplified and made better.
customer_reviews.author: Bongi Gwamanda

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein
customer_reviews.text: All hemp protein tastes bad. This is no exception. However, this is probably one of the healthiest protein powders you can buy. It has protein, healthy fats and fiber. Again, it dosen't taste as good as protein powders full of artificial ingredients and added sugars but it is a very affordable high serially protein. You can make it taste better by blending it with frozen fruits but i can stomach it with just water or juice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great shake boost.
customer_reviews.text: Really good additive for smoothies or shakes, for a runner who does more body style workouts than lifting this is perfect. Mix with powdered peanut butter for a great boost. Make sure you shake the heckk out of this before adding, it does tend to clump into little hemp balls.
customer_reviews.author: Don Solo

customer_reviews.title: No taste, a bit “fibery” texture
customer_reviews.text: There’s almost no taste and I definitely notice a difference in my trips to the porcelain throne. I add it to cake and brownie batters, chip dip, meat loaf, etc. I love the product and will continue use, but you can feel the fiber in your mouth. It’s not gross, but you can tell there’s going to be a party in your intestines.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: It tastes earthy and organic i love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it does not taste like fake flavoring. I mix it with my flaxseed powder, bananas, blueberries and my probiotics powder and has completely helped my IBS.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie143

customer_reviews.title: great for smoothies - tasteless
customer_reviews.text: Great for smoothies and definitely fills me up. It is tasteless which is why i love this product even more.
customer_reviews.author: lisa lu

customer_reviews.title: Strong nails and less bruises
customer_reviews.text: High in iron and magnesium, bruising less and sleeping better. Nails have never been so long or unbreakable before...actually wearing nailpolish and it's staying on! Like it for being less processed than other proteins, close to being a whole food.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Great texture to your smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the nutrional benefits, but I was very pleased with how it adds to teh texture of my smoothies! I'll be using this regularly
customer_reviews.author: SoCalBuyer154

customer_reviews.title: Cost Effective Health Drinks
customer_reviews.text: I recover faster from workouts and have more overall daily energy by including this in my diet. -very bland taste and gritty texture means its not a great stand-alone drink. But it mixes well with banana and almond milk- sometimes I add yogurt with strawberries or blueberries to change things up.
customer_reviews.author: Killian A.

customer_reviews.title: gross
customer_reviews.text: This protein tasted awful, I expected much more from it but it wasn't good at all. Dont waste your money on it. Buy real protein
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: Good but gritty
customer_reviews.text: Blends easily into smoothies, but pretty thick and definitely added a gritty taste.
customer_reviews.author: Aseligman

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: . Tastes very green, almost like wheatgrass in flavor and magic sand in texture. I believe it's good for you, just not my cup of tea. Barely used it because its pretty gritty. I like that they include recipes. Would like to try it again and update my review. Want to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying product
customer_reviews.text: My son is very conscious about his health and doing exercise.He tried so many other products but he likes this one so far
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj mehra

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Nutrient dense fiber that will have you poopin bricks like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very good product awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I buy every month. It has helped me mantain my weight. I make breading for my chicken, I put in smoothies with almond milk, bananas, honey
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Needs more grind.
customer_reviews.text: Even with my ninja blender, I'm having a hard time blending this powder into my drinks and shakes. Lots of residue remains in the bottom of my drinks. Awful taste also.
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER 321

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this one
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this one! It's gross. And can't hide the flavor even in peanut butter. Just my opinion tho.
customer_reviews.author: CrAsHtEsTbArBiE

customer_reviews.title: Is this even hemp? Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I've used several brands and all have been great. This one doesn't work. I question if it is even all hemp or if it is cut with filler.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I love that it adds hemp protein to my smoothies, very healthy. Great deal will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Luar Ximene

customer_reviews.title: Very good price for this
customer_reviews.text: Best price for this type of product. The quality is as good as any and flavor is about the same as others.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Butt

customer_reviews.title: Kept me satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I used this a a breakfast protein shake. I mixed with unsweetened vanilla almond milk and a touch of monk fruit sweetener. It was pretty good but was seedy. However definitely Will Hughes for me as it is the ONLY protein powder that is low in carbs that actually held me comfortably until lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Ann Rickey

customer_reviews.title: Do not like
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda disappointed with the flavor. Besides, it is granular instead of powdered.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee lover

customer_reviews.title: Love the Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: This is Our favorite protein powder. It tastes great with Everything we put in.
customer_reviews.author: BHAGYA MARIK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use the product to put in my smoothie. Flavor is good.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Hemp
customer_reviews.text: I love this Hemp Protein. I use it in my breads, yogurts and add it even in my brownies. No one ever knows and it makes it that much healthier. I love this brand because it isnt gritty and doesnt leave an after taste in my mouth when I use it in my protein drink after a work out.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff I put it in my every morning smoothy
customer_reviews.author: Myranda May

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Best hemp protein I have found. Mixes into milk without being gritty like other hemp protein powder!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Rough stuff. I have not been able to find a scenario where I can use this protein and not taste it. I’ve tried a very small dose in drinks and baked goods and it leaves a really bad dirt taste.
customer_reviews.author: AFS

customer_reviews.title: Gritty gritty gritty
customer_reviews.text: Good lord is this stuff gritty. Thank god my partner likes it, or it would've probably gone in the trash. It's tolerable in a smoothie, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product & value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand of Hemp powder! As Leary’s less expensive and better quality. Great value and quantity. Very fresh as expected! Packaged well and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: We use this daily in our smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: Being vegan and our kids having a predominantly plant based diet, we use this in our smoothies and the flavor is very mild. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heena Patel

customer_reviews.title: Okay taste, great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the nutrition! Tastes pretty good (although not my favorite)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not so good flavor
customer_reviews.text: This powder had a flavor that you could taste way more than whatever you put it in. Personally for me this was a downfall because it is such a unique flavor.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Blind taste test
customer_reviews.text: People talk about the taste and say it is not like others??....the product Hemp is made from the same plant no matter who manufacture/made it....the taste can not very that much if it 100% Hemp.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great flavoe
customer_reviews.text: Actually tastes good scooped into some almond milk and shaken
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly has a taste and has lots of protein! I mix it in my smoothies as a meal replacement. Great for the money! Going to be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Bazavilvazo

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: If you like grainy protein shakes then go for it. This was terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Nervous at first but definitely worth try I gn
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant.....but this tastes amazing! Will be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Nihitha

customer_reviews.title: Buy when on sale
customer_reviews.text: I got it on sale for 2 dollars what a steal
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah

customer_reviews.title: Worth if for dietary reasons and medical.
customer_reviews.text: Going to order more add it to my shakes for fiber and helps with the digestive tract.
customer_reviews.author: DesireeAnn Watson

customer_reviews.title: Confers superhuman traits
customer_reviews.text: Never before this hemp protein and fiber have I benefited from a product so enormously in excess of expectations. Put a big spoonful in your protein shake. Consider adding a plunger to your cart before checkout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Use it in everything. Feel better than I have in years.
customer_reviews.author: *Cooper85*

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: This order was deemed undeliverable because they did not want to use the given price. This is a sneaky way to avoid keeping the sale price intact
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR SMOOTHIES
customer_reviews.text: If you make your own healthy drinks, add this hemp product for extra protein.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice fibrous protien powder.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this protien powder, it's a lot more fibrous than others. It's sort of tasteless so blends with everything. This can be used for baking as well unlike other protien powders.
customer_reviews.author: Prashant Gawda

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great and comes with two excellent recipes for hemp banana bread and hemp pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: scotty ray payne

customer_reviews.title: Great high protein and high fiber protein
customer_reviews.text: High fiber content but very finely ground, making it digestible. Many brands are not.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Young

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really taste like anything so it mixes pretty well with any else I put in my smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Wang

customer_reviews.title: Good and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good for mixingn it with bananas and protein power. Good for the stomach and help reach my daily fibers and protein.
customer_reviews.author: M3KORITO

customer_reviews.title: Easy and healthy
customer_reviews.text: The taste isn’t bad at all I mix it with more protein. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Add to anythind
customer_reviews.text: A great source for fiber, uust add it to oatmeal or smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Fla. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder with fiber!
customer_reviews.text: The greatest value for the protein + powder that I was able to find. And it is organic! The taste is decent.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very soon expiration date
customer_reviews.text: One of the product we got has an expiration date of 2 months from the date we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyi Lee

customer_reviews.title: I substitute this for pea protein which I am not a fan of.
customer_reviews.text: mixes well in my smoothie and also use in my hot buck wheat cereal.
customer_reviews.author: El Kovachi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t enjoy
customer_reviews.text: It was gross to eat and very hard to feed kids !
customer_reviews.author: Swati

customer_reviews.title: Mixes very poorly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the regular hemp protein powder without the added fiber and it mixed well with water. This product with the added fiber mixes horribly. Even after mixed in a high speed blender for thirty seconds half of the product was still sitting at the bottom of the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Satan

customer_reviews.title: Not gluten free.
customer_reviews.text: Nina sensor tested for gluten found. I waited to long to return.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Vineyard

customer_reviews.title: No taste
customer_reviews.text: Luv this product and I can use the bathroom now
customer_reviews.author: BIG RED

customer_reviews.title: Great In Smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the Keto diet. I love that Just Hemp Protein+ has a great deal of fiber and only one net carb. Most mornings I blend Just Hemp with almond milk, a few almond milk ice cubes, a teaspoon of cinnamon, a teaspoon of turmeric and a scoop of MCT oil powder or a scoop of collagen powder. Makes a tasty and healthy Keto smoothie that leaves me feeling content and energized.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hare

customer_reviews.title: Don't be put off.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the container. It looked kinda gross. I smelled it. It smelled kinda gross. I put a big-ol' spoonful in with my (16 oz) smoothie. Made my smoothie look gross. Took a sip. As if by magic, there was almost no taste. Better yet, because of the fiber content, it kept me full WAY longer than the same smoothie without it. 10/10 will continue to have gross looking smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: I have never seen Hemp look like this! 😱
customer_reviews.text: This hemp has a very odd and weird look to it. It almost taste rancid and it looks very old and strange looking. Most Hemp that I have seen, has a light colored and different texture. This almost looks like Henna that you put in your hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix in but overall 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t mix well- even using a blender. That being said, I’ve had it every day in my shake. I stil use the blender and then just shake my drink before each sip. Gluten free dairy free and has a lot of protein and not a strong taste so it’s a win for me. Will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Mamalovesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while it hits $3.14 per can ... at that time, it's by far the best value for protein out there. This is made/grown in Canada too. For the price, it's an amazing value compared to the vast majority of protein powders from China. Hemp protein is 35% albumin, one of the easiest proteins to digest and the same protein in eggs. The other 65% is Edestin, which has a whole range of benefits (google "edestin dna repair" and "edestin hormone production" for instance). Even at $6 per tub, the usual price, it's a solid value. This particular brand is also high in fiber ... basically a protein, greens, and fiber supplement in 1.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with this product, the taste is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: You have to use 4 Tbs. to get the 11g of Protein, and it tastes horrible. I won't buy it again, shouldn't sent it back. It has a recipe for pancakes on the container, but I can't even imagine making them with the bad taste of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Adding this intense fiber has made a huge difference in my stomach issues.
customer_reviews.author: Benaiah Brabant

product_meta.title: Just Hemp Foods Hemp Protein Powder Plus Fiber, Non-GMO Verified with 11g of Protein & 11g of Fiber per Serving, 16 oz - Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: At just Hemp Foods, we start with only the highest quality hemp seed. Sourced and processed for maximum nutrition, this pure plant-based protein is gluten, soy and lactose free, and a good source of 9 vitamins ad minerals.
feature_bullets: Great tasting Hemp Hearts have a slightly nutty taste, similar to a sunflower seed or pine nut
Simply sprinkle on salad, cereal, granola, oatmeal & yogurt, add to smoothies and recipes or eat straight from the package
Contains more protein and omegas and less carbs than the same serving of Chia or Flax

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
